metadata.title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Jean Jacket
features: STYLE - Classic denim jean jacket with collar neck, button down front, long sleeves and 4 functional pockets on a regular fit body
LENGTH - this wardrobe staple is 24.5 inches from shoulders to hem with 24.5 inch long sleeves
description: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Aparel; Amanda denim jean jacket with coller ed neck, button down front and functional pockets. This cute wardrobe staple goes great with all top and bottom combinations as well as dresses and jumpsuits. Perfect for work, taking a class or running around town as is or as a layering piece. light weight durability maks it also ideal travel attire eveyone should have in thier wardrobe - Gloria Vanderbilt Brand; Effortlessly fun and stylish, a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
